statements: SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT id, date, time, water_usage FROM WaterUsageData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT date, sensor_id, soil_moisture FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT time, water_usage FROM WaterUsageData WHERE soil_moisture < 50;
SELECT id, date, sensor_id, soil_moisture FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_usage >= 50;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT id, date, water_usage FROM WaterUsageData WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND soil_moisture < 50 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT id, sensor_id, soil_moisture FROM WaterUsageData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY water_usage DESC
SELECT id, time, soil_moisture FROM WaterUsageData WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND date = '2022-02-15' ORDER BY time ASC
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE water_consumed > 100
SELECT id, date, time FROM Water_Usage_Data ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT AVG(water_consumed) AS avg_water_consumed FROM Water_Usage_Data
SELECT SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT date, SUM(water_used) AS total_water_used FROM Irrigation_Logs GROUP BY date HAVING total_water_used > 500
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT id, date, water_consumed FROM Water_Usage_Data ORDER BY water_consumed DESC;
SELECT AVG(water_used) AS avg_water_used FROM Irrigation_Logs WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT MAX(field_area) AS max_field_area FROM Irrigation_Logs WHERE water_used > 500;
SELECT id, date, time, water_consumed FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE location = 'Garden'
SELECT location, water_consumed FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_consumed > 100
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystems ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT system_id, location FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE water_source = 'Groundwater'
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE location = 'Garden' AND water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_consumed FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY location HAVING total_consumed > 500;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData JOIN IrrigationSystems ON WaterUsageData.location = IrrigationSystems.location WHERE IrrigationSystems.water_source = 'Well';
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 25 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT location, AVG(water_consumed) AS avg_consumed FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_consumed DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY Date ASC, Time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ID, UsageInLiters FROM WaterConsumption WHERE UsageInLiters > 1000;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE Type = 'Drip';
SELECT SystemID, Location FROM IrrigationSystem ORDER BY Location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT WeatherID, Temperature, Precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE Humidity > 70 AND Temperature < 30 ORDER BY WeatherID DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY UsageInLiters DESC, Date ASC
SELECT Location, Type FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE Efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY SystemID
SELECT WeatherID, Temperature, Humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature > 25 AND Humidity < 60
SELECT FieldID, Location FROM FarmFields WHERE AreaInAcres > 10 AND SoilType='Clay'
SELECT Date, Time, UsageInLiters FROM WaterConsumption WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT location, source_name FROM water_sources WHERE water_flow_rate > 10.5;
SELECT zone_name FROM irrigation_zones WHERE soil_type='Clay' ORDER BY zone_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_date, water_amount FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE zone_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT zone_id, MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_levels GROUP BY zone_id;
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM water_sources WHERE water_flow_rate > 10.0 ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT zone_name, soil_type FROM irrigation_zones WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY zone_name;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE water_amount BETWEEN 100.0 AND 200.0 ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT zone_location, COUNT(*) as total_logs FROM water_usage_logs GROUP BY zone_location HAVING total_logs > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
